title: COVID-19 Vaccine Information
sitename: Health and Human Services North Dakota
cleaned_text: Medium North Dakota Vaccine Locator To receive three vaccine sites on your phone within seconds (message and data rates may apply): - Text GETVAX to 438829 for English - Text VACUNA to 822862 for Spanish Find a clinic, sign up for news and notifications and more at [North Dakota Vaccination Registration Site](https://www.ndvax.org/). Need help finding a vaccine in the United States? Visit the [vaccines.gov website](https://www.vaccines.gov/search/). Featured Video Medium h2 Center Featured Video Medium Medium
